nodes.text: B. J. Rordan's Collectables was a two-story building located in Verena City. It was brown in color, with split plastic frames and peeling paint. It was run by Bren-Jules Rordan, an undercover Commission for the Preservation of the New Order Internal Security Bureau agent. Employed in the shop was Riin Raas, a Sullustan New Republic Intelligence Service agent, Cor Mynus, an Imperial Intelligence lieutenant, and Russ Jarib, an agent of Corporate Sector Intelligence.
